author: Jacob Leonard
comment: Maps need updated.  The Raccoon River Trail is a loop. I know because I ride it.

author: Brian lastnam
comment: The trail in my town is missing.

author: Kim Cornick
comment: my husband has this app on his iPhone and it works great, so I tried to install it on my android, and everytime I try to view anything it takes me back to the homepage and won't let me do anything else. what am I doing wrong?!
title: Won't run properly

author: Dave Woodhouse
comment: Works great on iPhone but still worthless for android

author: Russell Gilson
comment: There hasn't been any new news for a year
title: Need to have updates on trail conditions

author: DMR Rogers
comment: Keeps on getting hung up when it runs a person through the tutorial.    Under map when it draws the trail maps still appears there are a lot of pieces missing in Clive,  Urbandale and piece of the new Racoon connector out of Waukee.   miss some part's of the Douglas Parkway trail.  Missing piece on Boston Parkway east of 156th. Hope it's updated soon.
title: Missing trail pieces under draw map

author: Greg Blank
comment: There needs to be a way to suggest trails to be added. There are trails that I frequent but are either not on the map or don't have a page. Otherwise nice app.

author: Monty Siders
comment: Saw earlier todat that android was live so I shared with a few and waited til I got home to install the large app on wifi. My girlfriend  installed earlier  and ended up uninstalling it as she said it kept closing on her. Nothing  recent in the news corner. Have not tried to created account or log in yet. Clicking trails section the app closes. Clicking the maps takes awhile on wifi to get to the map to do much. Not Intuitive on what to do once therr. Definitely many trails not on map or labeled.  Is the us
title: Issues from the start

author: eria
comment: I've been waiting for this app for almost a year now. It was definitely worth the wait. Take the time to go through the tutorial you won't be sorry. Highly recommended.
title: Fluid and easy to use!

author: Kenneth Brandt
comment: Created account.... Try to open... Crash.... So it's not ready yet?

reply.author: Shift Interactive, LLC
reply.content: Hi Kenneth, it appears there is a bug in the "Trails" section that we did not encounter in testing -- we are working to fix this as many people are having the same issue.  I am uploading a new build this afternoon in which this issue among others has been addressed, we hope you'll give it a second try!

title: Doesn't work

author: Sam Wagner
comment: Nice filter and rating system to help plan our trip. Easy to navigate. Had no problem installing on my droid.
title: Ready to ride!

author: Brad Caudle
comment: Needs lots of work. It does not update  or refresh. It is confusing and selecting spots on the app does not highlight the trail and erase the trail that was selected  before changing the point of trail. I also want to say this is for biking, hiking and etc no driving cars or 18 wheelers. Don't put a drive botton put a bike botton. More work needed for 5 stars.
title: Great idea

author: Brad Lane
comment: Actually, It installs but the first time I try to open it I get an error from Samsung apps that says it couldn't install the Gear app and then the phone app is uninstalled.

reply.author: Shift Interactive, LLC
reply.content: Hi Brad, I am uploading a build this afternoon that addresses your issue.  We hope you'll give it another shot!

title: Unable to install
